about_the_game:
“Plague Doctor and Panacea” is a thrilling game where you are the last ray of hope for a doomed city plagued by a mysterious epidemic. Your mission is to infiltrate the gloomy castle dungeon full of dangers and find the ingredients for a universal cure.

You will have to become a real hero, dressed in the costume of a plague doctor. Explore the intricate labyrinths of the dungeon, where every step can be your last. Beware of the castle guards, who vigilantly guard the secrets needed to create the panacea. Fight your enemies using all your skills and cunning, because you have only one life to save the city from destruction.

Your goal is to collect 25 key items scattered throughout the dungeon. Among them:

Multicolored Crystals: Each crystal has unique properties needed for a cure.

Ancient Books: Contains forgotten knowledge and formulas, without which it is impossible to create a panacea.

Magic Potion: The key ingredient that binds all the components of the cure together.

Finding the ingredients is no easy task. Use the built-in navigator: yellow dots will indicate the location of the necessary items, and red dots will warn you of approaching enemies. Use the “F” button to illuminate the dark corners of the dungeon and do not miss any valuable artifacts.

Enemy attacks drain your strength. Look for vials with potions to restore your health and continue your journey. Don't forget to save your progress, because death is irreversible, and the fate of the city is in your hands.

Will you be able to overcome all the obstacles, collect all the ingredients and create a panacea to save the doomed city? Time will tell.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
